scenario_text.value: There’s so much stuff in here!

This is the faculty room. Adults do their
thing in here.

Adults, huh? So kids like you can’t use this
room, huh, Takuma?

Yeah, we don’t usually come in here. And if
we do, it’s usually to get yelled at.
Yelled at?! I hate getting yelled at!
Ha ha, I know the feeling.
I wonder if Labramon is okay...
